statements: SELECT supplier_name, overall_rating FROM supplier_performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE overall_rating > 4;
SELECT supplier_name FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE overall_rating < 3 OR order_accuracy < 90;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT supplier_name, order_accuracy, on_time_delivery FROM supplier_performance_metrics ORDER BY on_time_delivery DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE metric = 'accuracy' AND year = 2021 ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT metric, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE year = 2021 GROUP BY metric ORDER BY avg_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE year = 2021 AND (metric = 'efficiency' OR metric = 'quality') ORDER BY value ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM supplier_performance_metrics GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING COUNT(metric) > 2;
SELECT DISTINCT year FROM supplier_performance_metrics ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_metrics
SELECT supplier_id, on_time_delivery, quality_ratings FROM supplier_performance_metrics ORDER BY supplier_id DESC
SELECT supplier_id, quality_ratings FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE on_time_delivery > 0.8
SELECT * FROM supplier_orders ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT supplier_id, SUM(order_amount) AS total_order_amount FROM supplier_orders GROUP BY supplier_id
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_id, on_time_delivery FROM supplier_performance_metrics WHERE quality_ratings > 4.5 ORDER BY on_time_delivery DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, AVG(order_amount) AS avg_order_amount FROM supplier_orders GROUP BY supplier_id ORDER BY avg_order_amount DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, order_date, order_amount FROM supplier_orders WHERE order_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;

SELECT spm.supplier_id, spm.on_time_delivery, so.order_date, so.order_amount FROM supplier_performance_metrics spm INNER JOIN supplier_orders so ON spm.supplier_id = so.supplier_id WHERE spm.quality_ratings > 3.0 ORDER BY so.order_amount DESC, spm.on_time_delivery ASC;
SELECT * FROM SupplierMetrics;
SELECT supplier_id, on_time_delivery_rating FROM SupplierMetrics WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM DeliveryMetrics WHERE on_time = TRUE ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT quality_id, defect_count FROM QualityMetrics WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT AVG(quality_rating) as average_quality_rating FROM SupplierMetrics;
SELECT supplier_id, on_time_delivery_rating, quality_rating FROM SupplierMetrics
SELECT supplier_id, SUM(defect_count) AS total_defects FROM QualityMetrics GROUP BY supplier_id
SELECT supplier_id, AVG(on_time_delivery_rating) AS avg_rating FROM SupplierMetrics
SELECT * FROM DeliveryMetrics WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT supplier_id, MAX(quality_rating) AS max_rating FROM SupplierMetrics
SELECT * FROM Supplier;
SELECT supplier_name, on_time_delivery_rating FROM Supplier ORDER BY on_time_delivery_rating DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, quality_rating FROM Supplier WHERE quality_rating > 3;
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_date, delivery_status FROM Delivery WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT supplier_name, quality_score FROM Quality ORDER BY quality_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM Supplier ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, on_time_delivery_rating FROM Supplier WHERE on_time_delivery_rating > 3;

SELECT supplier_name, delivery_date, quality_score FROM Supplier JOIN Delivery ON Supplier.supplier_id = Delivery.supplier_id JOIN Quality ON Supplier.supplier_id = Quality.supplier_id WHERE Delivery.delivery_status = 'Delivered' AND Quality.quality_score > 8;

SELECT supplier_name, delivery_date, quality_date, delivery_status FROM Supplier JOIN Delivery ON Supplier.supplier_id = Delivery.supplier_id JOIN Quality ON Supplier.supplier_id = Quality.supplier_id JOIN Report ON Supplier.supplier_id = Report.supplier_id WHERE Report.report_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_id, supplier_name, on_time_delivery_rating, quality_rating FROM Supplier ORDER BY supplier_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_metrics;
SELECT supplier_id, on_time_delivery_rating FROM supplier_performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM order_details WHERE on_time_delivery = TRUE;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quality_rating FROM order_details ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT contact_name, email, phone_number FROM supplier_contacts;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_metrics;
SELECT supplier_id, on_time_delivery_rating FROM supplier_performance_metrics ORDER BY on_time_delivery_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM order_details WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND quality_rating >= 4;
SELECT supplier_id, contact_name, email FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT supplier_id, location_name, city, state FROM supplier_locations WHERE state = 'CA';
